channel.title: Help me please [no more need for help]
channel.description:
[s][b]Help please[/b] On the runefx source base what is the warrior guild shop npc and its id called because i cannot find it in the npc file, many thanks.
[b]-----[EDIT]--------[/b] Ok i found the npc's name - shanomibut when i use ctrl+f in npc file and search the name it hasn't got any results id be greatful to anyone who can find me the id for this npc[/s]
[b]-----[EDIT]--------[/b] Ok guys i looked in the spawn-config file found warrior guild npcs with shanomis name next to it and its all sorted now but thanks anyways

item.title: Help me please [no more need for help]

[s]Help please
On the runefx source base what is the warrior guild shop npc and its id called because i cannot find it in the npc file, many thanks.

-----[EDIT]--------
Ok i found the npc’s name - shanomibut when i use ctrl+f in npc file and search the name it hasn’t got any results id be greatful to anyone who can find me the id for this npc[/s]
